Beatrice Balana Bofia (amuru na November 9, 1984) bu onye egwuregwu basketball nke America America, na-egwu ugbu a maka Mahadum Arizona The Arizona Wildcats
A mụrụ ya na Bafia, Cameroon, ma bụrụ nwanne ejima tọrọ Suzy Bofia
N'ịdị elu 6 ụkwụ na 7½ inch, Bofia na-edobekarị dị ka etiti n'ihi nnukwu ịdị elu ya.
Bofia malitere ịgba bọọlụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Nwanne ya nwanyị nke nta, Suzy, malitere obere oge ka nke ahụ gasịrị
Ọrụ ya mere ka ọ kpọọ na Technical High School afọ abụọ na Cameroon.
O mechara gaa Illinois Central College na America.
Onye na-agafe na kọleji site na Illinois Central, onye bụbu onye nkuzi Arizona bụ Joan Bonvicini tinyere nwanne ya nwanyị Suzy kpọrọ Bofia
Ọ pụtara na egwuregwu Iri abụọ na itoolu maka Wildcats n'oge oge mbụ ya.
n'okpuru onye isi nchịkwa Steve Garber, ọ nwetara akara 4.4 na 3.5 rebounds maka Cougars.
Na mbido Nọvemba 2006, Beatrice nwere obere mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere nke mere ka ọ ghara ịga ebe ọ na gba bọọlụ ruo ọtụtụ izu
A na-eyi ya redshirt ma nọrọ n'èzí n'oge niile nke 2006-07
Ọ laghachiri n'oge gara aga iji mee nkezi atọ na atọ rebounds kwa egwuregwu.
Ọ pụtara na egwuregwu iri abụọ na itoolu maka Wildcats n'oge oge mbụ ya na otu ahụ.
A na-ewere Beatrice na Suzy dị ka ụmụ ejima kachasị ogologo n'ụwa
Otú ọ dị, Guinness World Records depụtara ndị egwuregwu volleyball Ann Recht na Claire Recht dị ka ndị kachasị elu
A naghịzi arụrịta ụka na ndekọ a ebe ọ bụ na a tụrụ ụmụnne nwanyị Recht ọzọ mgbe ha dị afọ 18 na 2006 ma ha abụọ dịkarịa ala 6'7".   Ụmụnne nwanyị Bofia agbaghabeghị ndekọ a kemgbe afọ 2006.
